availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel M. Wilson (Green County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Nelson County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Stearman Wilson in Green County, Kentucky, on December 1, 1836. Father of William T. Wilson, Hugh W. Wilson, Mary A. Wilson, Sarah J. Wilson, Catharine Wilson, Susan E. Wilson, Samuel R. Wilson, Margaret Wilson, John R. Wilson, and Benjamin C. Wilson. Farmer in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 111B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 556.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 2, p. 449A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 14290.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 000595013.
